headline: Exagen Inc. Appoints Chas McKhann to Board of Directors
summary: CARLSBAD, Calif., July 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Exagen Inc. (Nasdaq: XGN), a leading provider of innovative autoimmune testing solutions, announced today the appointment of Chas McKhann to its Board of Directors, effective July 17, 2025. Mr. McKhann is an accomplished leader with over 25 years of experience in the life sciences industry, including Board and C-suite positions leading turnaround and transformational growth at multiple medical technology companies. headline: Abbott Stock Falls in Pre-Market Despite Q2 Earnings and Sales Beat
summary: ABT beats on Q2 earnings and revenues with double-digit growth in Medical Devices, yet shares fall 5% pre-market.

headline: ZBH Stock Set to Benefit From New Monogram Technologies Buyout Deal
summary: Zimmer Biomet eyes long-term gains with the $177M Monogram buyout, aiming to expand its robotic knee surgery offerings by 2027.

headline: Boston Scientific Stock Is on Pause. Its Earnings Could Get It Moving Higher Again.
summary: The company, which has spent billions over the past decade to acquire dozens of smaller companies, has a long track record of strong growth.
